column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hello Maria - Thank you for your review. I'm sorry you did not enjoy your dining experience. Thank you for your review. We regret that you did not fully enjoy our fare. Please know that if you have any issue whatsoever with your ramen you can tell your server and he or she will be happy to remake your order until it meets your satisfaction or replace it with something else. Failing that
column2: they will gladly remove the item from your tab. In particular
column3: our chefs can always make your ramen with "less oil" and/or "less salt."
